metadata.titleEn: Human activity parameters at Qilian Mountain Area (V1.0) (2018)
metadata.titleCn: 祁连山区域30m人类活动参数产品数据集（V1.0）（2018）
metadata.description: This data set includes 30 m farmland and bulidingland distribution products in Qilian Mountains in 2018. The product is based on Landsat-8/OLI data. In the production of farmland products, the Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI) is used, and the production rules are set by using the prior knowledge of crop phenology and planting types. In the production of buildingland products, the normalized NDVI is used by using the Landsat series data synthesized in summer. other indexs like NDBI, MNDWI and other data like DEM, lighting data are used together to set product production rules. The accuracy of the products of farmland andbuildingland in 2018 is 90.05% and 90.97% respectively, based on the high-definition image of Google Earth and field survey data.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括祁连山区域2018年的30m耕地和建筑用地分布产品。该产品基于Landsat-8/OLI数据生产。生产耕地产品时，利用夏季合成的OLI数据，使用归一化植被指数NDVI，并辅助以作物的物候期、作物种植类别等先验知识设定产品生产规则；生产建筑用地产品时，利用夏季合成的Landsat系列数据，使用归一化植被指数NDVI、NDBI、MNDWI等指数，辅助以DEM、灯光数据等设定产品生产规则。由Google Earth高清影像和实地调研数据进行精度评价，得出2018年耕地和建筑用地产品的精度分别为90.05%和90.97%。
metadata.instructions:
File Naming Convention: YYYY_QiLianShan_ WholeArea_**30.tif (YYYY: year; **: parameter name)
Data Version：V1.0
Projection：+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 +no_defs
Data Format: GeoTIFF, 66777 rows ×40598 columes
Filled Value：0
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名约定：YYYY_QiLianShan_WholeArea_**30.tif	（YYYY：年；**：参数名称）
数据版本号：V1.0
投影：+proj=longlat +datum=WGS84 + UTM
数据格式：GeoTIFF, 66777行×40598列
填充值：0

background: The increased information on time dimension of time series HJ-1/CCD data improves the classification accuracy for most of the land cover types including water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands; consequently, the overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient have 10% and 0.1 improvements respectively. The advantage of HJ-1/CCD data in land cover/use classification makes it a reference for new remote sensing satellite or sensor development. Overall, a new land cover/use classification method using HJ-1/CCD data based on time series analysis is developed and this method does improve the classification accuracy compared with the method using single remote sensing data. In addition, the introducing of the very high spatial resolution data within Google Earth can also improve the sampling accuracy and lower the cost of data purchasing and field campaigns.
research objective: Therefore, by taking the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data we propose a new method for finer resolution land cover mapping using time series HJ-1/CCD data, which can greatly improve the land cover mapping accuracy.
challenges: This method uses much more data and dramatically increases the computation loading; the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
methods: In this study, the advantages of HJ-1/CCD on spatial resolution and temporal frequency are fully taken to make a time series data with 30 m spatial resolution of experimental areas. The land cover classification method using time series HJ-1/CCD data includes six steps, which are detailed as follows: (1) Constructing the time series HJ-1/CCD data. In order to take advantages of HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping, the composite of experimental areas is made using multi-scenes of HJ-1/CCD images, and 12 composites corresponding to 12 months in 2010 are made, which are made up the time series images of the experimental areas yearly. (2) Data preprocessing. After the data are prepared, the data pre-processes including geometric correction, radiometric calibration and atmospheric correction need to be done to make a “perfect” time series HJ-1/CCD data composite. (3) NDVI calculating. Instead of time series of HJ-1/CCD data, time series of NDVI are used as the input of SVM for classification. (1) Sampling. The classifier used in this study is SVM, which needs a good sample set for training purpose. (2) SVM classification. Support Vector Machine (SVM) is a robotic learning method developed from statistics learning theory and optimization theory in the 1990s. (3) Post-classification. Some of the land cover types are very difficult to separate, so some extra work needs to be done to improve the classification accuracy.
dataset: The data are downloaded for free at websites of Satellite Environment Center, Ministry of Environmental Protection or China Center of Resources Satellite Data and Application. The HJ-1 satellite constellation consists of three satellites, named as HJ-1A, HJ-1B, and HJ-1C respectively. HJ-1A has two CCD cameras and one hyperspectral instrument onboard; HJ-1B has two CCD cameras and one infrared camera onboard; HJ-1C is a SAR satellite. For CCD cameras, their nominal spatial resolution is 30 m. HJ-1/CCDs have three visible bands (430–520 nm, 520–600 nm, and 630–690 nm) and one near-infrared band (760–900 nm).
findings: In our two study areas, the very high resolution remote sensing data within Google Earth are used to validate the land cover mapping results, which shows a very high mapping accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% and a high Kappa coefficient of 0.9423 and 0.8165 in the Dahuofang area of Liaoning Province and the Heiquan area of Gansu Province respectively.
backgroundCn: 时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据中增加的时间维度信息提高了大多数土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，包括水体、城市区域、森林和农田；因此，整体准确率和Kappa系数分别提高了10%和0.1。HJ-1/CCD数据在土地覆盖/使用分类中的优势使其成为新遥感卫星或传感器开发的参考。总体而言，基于时间序列分析的HJ-1/CCD数据的新土地覆盖/使用分类方法被开发出来，并且该方法相比于使用单一遥感数据的方法确实提高了分类准确性。此外，引入Google Earth中的非常高空间分辨率数据也可以提高采样准确性，并降低数据购买和实地考察的成本。
research objectiveCn: 因此，通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，我们提出了一种利用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行更精细分辨率土地覆盖制图的新方法，这可以大大提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。
challengesCn: 该方法使用了更多的数据，并显著增加了计算负载；HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳降低了其可用性，并增加了使用上的难度。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，充分利用HJ-1/CCD在空间分辨率和时间频率上的优势，制作了具有30米空间分辨率的实验区时间序列数据。使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的土地覆盖分类方法包括六个步骤，具体如下：（1）构建时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据。为了利用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图，使用多场景HJ-1/CCD影像制作实验区的合成图像，制作了12个对应于2010年12个月的合成图像，构成了实验区的年度时间序列影像。（2）数据预处理。在数据准备好后，需要进行几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正等数据预处理，以制作“完美”的时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据合成图。（3）NDVI计算。使用NDVI的时间序列作为SVM分类的输入，而不是HJ-1/CCD数据的时间序列。（4）采样。本研究中使用的分类器是支持向量机（SVM），它需要一个良好的样本集用于训练。（5）SVM分类。支持向量机（SVM）是一种基于统计学习理论和优化理论发展起来的机器学习方法，起源于1990年代。（6）后分类。由于某些土地覆盖类型非常难以区分，因此需要进行一些额外的工作以提高分类精度。
datasetCn: 数据可以在卫星环境中心、环境保护部或中国资源卫星数据与应用中心的网站上免费下载。HJ-1卫星星座由三颗卫星组成，分别命名为HJ-1A、HJ-1B和HJ-1C。HJ-1A上搭载有两台CCD相机和一个高光谱仪；HJ-1B上搭载有两台CCD相机和一台红外相机；HJ-1C是一颗合成孔径雷达（SAR）卫星。对于CCD相机，其标称空间分辨率为30米。HJ-1/CCD具有三个可见光波段（430–520 nm、520–600 nm和630–690 nm）和一个近红外波段（760–900 nm）。
findingsCn: 在我们的两个研究区域，使用Google Earth中的超高分辨率遥感数据来验证土地覆盖制图结果，显示出大连地区的制图准确率为95.76%和甘肃省黑泉地区为83.78%，Kappa系数分别为0.9423和0.8165。

background: Land-cover datasets are crucial for research on eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling. Remote sensing has become widely used as a macro-observing system for land-cover mapping, which can substitute for plant functional type (PFT) as the baseline. Several moderate to fine resolution global land-cover datasets, which are presented in detail in Table I, based on different satellite sensors are available from different research groups. These land-cover datasets listed in Table I have large variability for three reasons: 1) the data quality and properties are different; 2) there is no standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories; and 3) they are not consistent with the Earth System Model’s (ESM) requirements, because the concept of PFT, whose traits represent a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions, used in ESMs cannot be mapped directly using remote-sensing land-cover datasets. The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
research objective: In order to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in the HRB, a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation is developed by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands.
challenges: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
methods: The procedure for constructing time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD is introduced as follows and the details of the procedure can be found in [26]. Geometric correction: A mosaic of the HRB is made using Landsat/TM imagery. The mosaic of Landsat/TM is used as the base image and all HJ-1/CCD images are automatically corrected through the image-to-image registration method by [43]. Radiometric calibration: Converting the DN values of the HJ-1/CCD images to top of atmosphere (TOA) radiance with given calibration coefficients. Atmospheric correction: Removing the atmospheric effects of remote-sensing images to obtain the surface reflectance. This correction was achieved with a spatial extension method developed by [44]. After the preprocessing has been done, all the HJ-1/CCD images within 1 month are subset and mosaicked; consequently, 10 mosaics for 10 months in the HRB are made and time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD are constructed.
dataset: The HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data used in this research were provided by the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application (CRESDA, http://www.cresda.com). The Landsat TM/ETM+ data were downloaded from the USGS website (http://landsat.usgs.gov/). The MODIS data were downloaded from the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/). The VHSR data were from Google Earth by Google Inc.
findings: A ground campaign was performed to evaluate the accuracy of crop classification and an overall accuracy of 84.09% for the crop classification was achieved.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模的研究至关重要。遥感已成为广泛使用的宏观观测系统，用于土地覆盖制图，可以替代植物功能类型（PFT）作为基线。根据不同的卫星传感器，来自不同研究小组的多种中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集可供使用，这些数据集在表I中详细列出。这些土地覆盖数据集的变异性很大，主要有三个原因：1）数据质量和属性不同；2）将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别没有标准方法；3）它们与地球系统模型（ESM）的要求不一致，因为在ESM中使用的PFT概念，其特征代表了一系列光谱关系、气候、生态和理论假设的组合，无法直接通过遥感土地覆盖数据集进行映射。光学遥感影像中土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱系统中灌木、草地和森林类别之间，因为森林覆盖所需的最小阈值存在差异。
research objectiveCn: 为了提高HRB地区生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，开发了一种综合方法，通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，进行每月土地覆盖的细致空间分辨率和更多作物/植被类别的制图。
challengesCn: 光学遥感影像中的土地覆盖分类最高的不确定性通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异所致。
methodsCn: 构建HJ-1/CCD HRB马赛克时间序列的程序如下，具体细节可以参考[26]。几何校正：使用Landsat/TM影像制作HRB的马赛克。Landsat/TM的马赛克作为基础影像，所有HJ-1/CCD影像通过图像间配准方法自动校正，参考文献[43]。辐射校准：将HJ-1/CCD影像的DN值转换为给定校准系数的大气顶辐射率（TOA）。大气校正：去除遥感影像的大气影响，以获得地表反射率。该校正是通过文献[44]中开发的空间扩展方法实现的。预处理完成后，所有在1个月内的HJ-1/CCD影像被子集化并拼接；因此，HRB的10个月内制作了10个马赛克，并构建了HJ-1/CCD的HRB马赛克时间序列。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的HJ-1/CCD遥感数据由中国资源卫星数据与应用中心（CRESDA，http://www.cresda.com）提供。Landsat TM/ETM+数据从USGS网站（http://landsat.usgs.gov/）下载。MODIS数据从NASA戈达德太空飞行中心（http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/）下载。VHSR数据来自谷歌公司（Google Inc.）的谷歌地球（Google Earth）。
findingsCn: 进行了一项地面调查，以评估作物分类的准确性，最终实现了84.09%的总体准确率。

Verification.QuestionEn: Are high-resolution Google Earth images used to validate land cover mapping results in the discussed methodologies?
Verification.QuestionCn: 高分辨率的谷歌地球图像是否用于验证所讨论方法中的土地覆盖映射结果？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Is the main method for land cover mapping using HJ-1/CCD data based on time series analysis, single image classification, or spectral analysis?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的主要方法是基于时间序列分析、单幅图像分类还是光谱分析？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which type of satellite data is primarily used for mapping land cover in the HRB, HJ-1/CCD, Landsat TM/ETM+, or MODIS?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪种类型的卫星数据主要用于在HRB地区进行土地覆盖制图，HRB、HJ-1/CCD、Landsat TM/ETM+还是MODIS？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What challenges are faced when using optical remotely sensed imagery for land-cover classification?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时面临的挑战有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: high uncertainty in classification between cropland and grassland categories
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 在耕地和草地类别之间的分类存在高度不确定性。

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can potential datasets for remote sensing data be accessed for research in this field?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 潜在的遥感数据集可以在哪里访问，以便在该领域进行研究？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application, USGS, NASA Goddard Space Flight Center, Google Earth
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 中国资源卫星应用中心，美国地质调查局，NASA戈达德太空飞行中心，谷歌地球

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of how remote sensing data is utilized to improve land cover classification accuracy in eco-hydrological research?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个例子，说明遥感数据如何用于提高生态水文研究中的土地覆盖分类准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: In eco-hydrological research, remote sensing data like HJ-1/CCD, Landsat, and MODIS are used to construct time series data for land cover classification. These datasets help improve accuracy by providing detailed temporal and spectral information that is crucial for distinguishing between various land cover types.
Example.AnswerCn: 在生态水文研究中，遥感数据如HJ-1/CCD、Landsat和MODIS被用于构建土地覆盖分类的时间序列数据。这些数据集通过提供详细的时间和光谱信息，帮助提高分类的准确性，这对于区分各种土地覆盖类型至关重要。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered when using optical remote sensing data for land-cover classification?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用光学遥感数据进行土地覆盖分类时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A common challenge in using optical remote sensing data for land-cover classification is the high uncertainty between certain categories, such as cropland and grassland, particularly in dryland systems. This is due to the variability in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
Example.AnswerCn: 在使用光学遥感数据进行土地覆盖分类时，一个常见的挑战是某些类别之间的不确定性较高，例如农田和草地，特别是在干旱地区。这是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值的变异性所致。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a dataset used to create a high-resolution land cover map using time series analysis?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于通过时间序列分析创建高分辨率土地覆盖图的示例数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used for creating a high-resolution land cover map is the HJ-1/CCD satellite data. This data provides time series images with a spatial resolution of 30 meters, which are used for land cover classification through various processing steps like geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于创建高分辨率土地覆盖图的一个数据集是HJ-1/CCD卫星数据。该数据提供了时间序列图像，空间分辨率为30米，这些图像通过几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正等各种处理步骤用于土地覆盖分类。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of data preprocessing techniques used in land cover mapping with remote sensing data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于遥感数据土地覆盖制图的数据预处理技术的特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 几何校正，辐射定标，大气校正

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the features of remote sensing indices utilized for classifying land cover types?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于分类土地覆盖类型的遥感指数的特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: Normalized Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI), Normalized Difference Built-up Index (NDBI), Modified Normalized Difference Water Index (MNDWI)
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 归一化差异植被指数 (NDVI)，归一化差异建筑指数 (NDBI)，改进的归一化差异水体指数 (MNDWI)

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the spatial resolution of the HJ-1/CCD data used in land cover classification?
Quantification.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD数据在土地覆盖分类中使用的空间分辨率是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many visible bands are available in the HJ-1/CCD data for classification purposes?
Quantification.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD数据可用于分类的可见波段有多少个？

Definition.QuestionEn: What do 'spatiotemporal advantages' mean in the context of remote sensing data for land cover mapping?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据用于土地覆盖制图的背景下，“时空优势”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: The term 'spatiotemporal advantages' refers to the benefits of having both spatial resolution and temporal frequency in remote sensing data, which can enhance the accuracy of land cover mapping by providing continuous and detailed datasets over time.
Definition.AnswerCn: “时空优势”一词指的是在遥感数据中同时具备空间分辨率和时间频率的好处，这可以通过提供连续和详细的时间序列数据来提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'geometric and radiometric correction' in the preprocessing of remote sensing data?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据的预处理过程中，“几何校正”和“辐射校正”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Geometric and radiometric correction' in remote sensing data preprocessing involves modifying the raw data to correct distortions and inaccuracies. Geometric correction aligns the images with geographical coordinates, while radiometric correction adjusts the data to reflect true surface radiance by compensating for sensor and atmospheric effects.
Definition.AnswerCn: “几何和辐射校正”在遥感数据预处理过程中涉及对原始数据进行修改，以纠正失真和不准确性。几何校正将图像与地理坐标对齐，而辐射校正则通过补偿传感器和大气效应来调整数据，以反映真实的地表辐射。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'normalization indices' refer to in the context of remote sensing data analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据分析的背景下，“归一化指数”指的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: 'Normalization indices' in remote sensing data analysis refer to mathematical combinations of spectral bands, such as NDVI (Normalized Difference Vegetation Index), NDBI (Normalized Difference Built-up Index), and MNDWI (Modified Normalized Difference Water Index), used to enhance certain features and improve land cover classification.
Definition.AnswerCn: “归一化指数”在遥感数据分析中是指光谱波段的数学组合，例如 NDVI（归一化差异植被指数）、NDBI（归一化差异建筑指数）和 MNDWI（改进的归一化差异水体指数），用于增强某些特征并改善土地覆盖分类。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What data collection methods can be inferred as necessary for accurately mapping land cover types using time series satellite data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 可以推断出哪些数据收集方法对于使用时间序列卫星数据准确绘制土地覆盖类型是必要的？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Accurate land cover mapping using time series satellite data requires constructing a composite of images from multiple scenes, preprocessing for geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, and utilizing indices like NDVI for classification. Very high spatial resolution data from sources like Google Earth can also improve sampling accuracy.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 准确的土地覆盖制图需要利用多场景的时间序列卫星数据构建图像合成，进行几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正，并利用如NDVI等指数进行分类。来自谷歌地球等来源的非常高空间分辨率数据也可以提高采样精度。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the challenges in land-cover classification between cropland and grassland categories inform the design of data collection strategies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在农田和草地类别之间的土地覆盖分类挑战如何影响数据收集策略的设计？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The challenges in distinguishing between cropland and grassland due to classification uncertainties suggest a need for enhanced data collection strategies that include multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data. This approach helps in accommodating the variability in data quality and resolving inconsistencies with Earth System Model requirements.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 由于分类不确定性，在区分农田和草地方面面临挑战，这表明需要增强数据收集策略，包括多种分类器和多源遥感数据。这种方法有助于适应数据质量的变异性，并解决与地球系统模型要求的不一致性。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What potential datasets or remote sensing technologies could be integrated to enhance the classification accuracy of land cover mapping in eco-hydrological models?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 哪些潜在的数据集或遥感技术可以集成，以提高生态水文模型中土地覆盖分类的准确性？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Potential datasets include HJ-1/CCD remote sensing data, Landsat TM/ETM+ data, MODIS data, and very high spatial resolution data from Google Earth. Integrating these datasets with advanced classifiers and leveraging their spatial and temporal resolution advantages can significantly enhance classification accuracy in eco-hydrological models.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集包括HJ-1/CCD遥感数据、Landsat TM/ETM+数据、MODIS数据以及来自Google Earth的高分辨率数据。将这些数据集与先进的分类器结合，并利用它们在空间和时间分辨率上的优势，可以显著提高生态水文模型中的分类准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the increased computation loading in data collection methods for land cover mapping using time series analysis?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用时间序列分析进行土地覆盖制图的数据收集方法中，导致计算负载增加的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The method uses a large amount of data, which significantly increases the computation loading. Additionally, the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data make it harder to use, thus increasing the complexity of data processing.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 该方法使用大量数据，这显著增加了计算负担。此外，HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，使得使用起来更加困难，从而增加了数据处理的复杂性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is there high variability and uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么光学遥感影像的土地覆盖分类存在较高的变异性和不确定性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: High variability and uncertainty arise due to differences in data quality and properties, the lack of a standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories, and the inconsistency with Earth System Model’s requirements. Additionally, optical imagery often struggles to differentiate between similar categories like cropland and grassland, and in dryland systems among shrub, grassland, and forest due to differing definitions of minimum forest cover thresholds.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 由于数据质量和属性的差异、缺乏将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别的标准方法，以及与地球系统模型要求的不一致性，导致了高变异性和不确定性。此外，光学影像在区分相似类别（如农田和草地）以及在干旱地区区分灌木、草地和森林方面也面临困难，因为对最低森林覆盖阈值的定义存在差异。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the consequences of using time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping on the classification accuracy of remote sensing datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图可能对遥感数据集的分类精度产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Using time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping could significantly improve classification accuracy due to the increased information on the time dimension, leading to better identification of land cover types such as water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands. This method improves overall accuracy and the Kappa coefficient by 10% and 0.1, respectively, compared to using single remote sensing data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图可以显著提高分类精度，因为时间维度提供了更多的信息，从而更好地识别水体、城市区域、森林和农田等土地覆盖类型。与使用单一遥感数据相比，这种方法使整体精度和Kappa系数分别提高了10%和0.1。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might incorporating very high spatial resolution data from sources like Google Earth impact the validation and cost of land cover mapping datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 将来自Google Earth等来源的非常高空间分辨率数据纳入土地覆盖映射数据集的验证和成本可能会产生什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Incorporating very high spatial resolution data from sources like Google Earth can improve the sampling accuracy and lower the cost of data purchasing and field campaigns, resulting in high mapping accuracy, as evidenced by the validation results showing a mapping accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% in two study areas.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用来自谷歌地球等来源的非常高空间分辨率数据可以提高采样准确性，降低数据购买和实地考察的成本，从而实现高映射精度，验证结果显示在两个研究区域的映射准确率分别为95.76%和83.78%。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary goal of developing new methods for land cover mapping using time series HJ-1/CCD data?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 开发基于时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的新土地覆盖制图方法的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary goal is to greatly improve the land cover mapping accuracy by leveraging the spatiotemporal advantages of HJ-1/CCD data, which includes enhancing classification accuracy for various land cover types and making it a reference for new remote sensing satellite or sensor development.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，显著提高土地覆盖制图的准确性，包括提高各种土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，并使其成为新遥感卫星或传感器开发的参考。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it beneficial to use very high spatial resolution data within Google Earth for land cover mapping validation?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 为什么在谷歌地球中使用非常高空间分辨率的数据进行土地覆盖映射验证是有益的？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Using very high spatial resolution data within Google Earth can significantly improve the sampling accuracy and reduce the cost of data purchasing and field campaigns, thereby enhancing the overall effectiveness and efficiency of land cover mapping validation.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 使用谷歌地球中的高空间分辨率数据可以显著提高采样准确性，降低数据购买和实地考察的成本，从而增强土地覆盖制图验证的整体有效性和效率。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the intention behind using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data for eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in the HRB?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在HRB（流域）中使用多种分类器和多源遥感数据进行生态水文和土地过程建模的意图是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intention is to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling by developing a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation, thus addressing the high uncertainty in land-cover classification between different categories.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目的是通过开发一种综合方法，以更高的空间分辨率和更多的作物/植被类别来绘制每月土地覆盖图，从而提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，解决不同类别之间土地覆盖分类的高不确定性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in developing a high-accuracy land cover classification method using time series remote sensing data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列遥感数据开发高精度土地覆盖分类方法涉及哪些程序步骤？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps involved in developing a high-accuracy land cover classification method using time series remote sensing data include constructing the time series data using multi-scene composites, conducting geometric correction, performing radiometric calibration, applying atmospheric correction, calculating NDVI for input into classification algorithms like SVM, and conducting post-classification adjustments to enhance accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 开发高精度土地覆盖分类方法的程序步骤包括：使用多场景合成构建时间序列数据，进行几何校正，执行辐射校准，应用大气校正，计算NDVI以输入分类算法（如支持向量机），以及进行后分类调整以提高准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can remote sensing data from multiple sources be integrated to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何整合来自多个来源的遥感数据，以提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling, remote sensing data from multiple sources can be integrated by constructing time series mosaics, performing geometric and radiometric calibration, and conducting atmospheric correction. This integration allows for mapping with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation using multiple classifiers and multisource data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，可以通过构建时间序列马赛克、进行几何和辐射校正以及进行大气校正，整合来自多个来源的遥感数据。这种整合可以实现更高空间分辨率的制图，并使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源数据来映射更多类别的作物/植被。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do advancements in time series analysis enhance the accuracy of land cover classification using remote sensing data?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 时间序列分析的进展如何提高使用遥感数据进行土地覆盖分类的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Advancements in time series analysis, such as using HJ-1/CCD data, improve the classification accuracy for land cover types by providing more detailed temporal information, which enhances the overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient of classification results.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 时间序列分析的进展，例如使用HJ-1/CCD数据，通过提供更详细的时间信息，提高了土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，从而增强了分类结果的整体准确性和Kappa系数。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions are necessary for improving the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling through land cover mapping methodologies?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 通过土地覆盖制图方法提高生态水文和土地过程建模准确性需要哪些条件？
Enablement.AnswerEn: To improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling, a comprehensive method using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands is necessary, along with addressing uncertainties in classification, especially between cropland and grassland categories.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 为了提高生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，需要采用一种综合方法，利用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，同时解决分类中的不确定性，特别是在农田和草地类别之间的分类问题。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in using time series data for land cover classification?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列数据进行土地覆盖分类可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenges in using time series data for land cover classification include the increased computation load due to the large amount of data and the difficulties arising from not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of some satellite data, which lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 使用时间序列数据进行土地覆盖分类的挑战包括由于数据量大而导致的计算负担增加，以及一些卫星数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，这降低了其可用性并增加了使用上的困难。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is there a high uncertainty in land-cover classification between certain categories such as cropland and grassland?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在某些类别之间，如农田和草地，土地覆盖分类存在较高的不确定性？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The high uncertainty in land-cover classification between categories like cropland and grassland is due to differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover and variations in data quality and properties, which affects the ability to classify continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在土地覆盖分类中，农田和草地等类别之间的高不确定性是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异以及数据质量和属性的变化，这影响了将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别的能力。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the potential advantages and disadvantages of using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的潜在优缺点是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The potential advantages of using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping include improved classification accuracy due to its spatial resolution and temporal frequency, which can be enhanced by developing a time series analysis. However, disadvantages include challenges related to the data's geometric and radiometric qualities, which may complicate its usability.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的潜在优势包括由于其空间分辨率和时间频率提高分类准确性，这可以通过开发时间序列分析来增强。然而，缺点包括与数据的几何和辐射质量相关的挑战，这可能会使其可用性变得复杂。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using time series HJ-1/CCD data in improving land cover classification accuracy compared to single remote sensing datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据在提高土地覆盖分类准确性方面相较于单一遥感数据集的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of time series HJ-1/CCD data significantly improves land cover classification accuracy due to its spatiotemporal advantage. It provides better classification of land cover types like water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands, resulting in a 10% increase in overall accuracy and a 0.1 improvement in the Kappa coefficient. However, it also introduces challenges such as increased computational load and the need for improved geometric and radiometric quality.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据显著提高了土地覆盖分类的准确性，这得益于其时空优势。它对水体、城市区域、森林和农田等土地覆盖类型的分类效果更佳，整体准确率提高了10%，Kappa系数改善了0.1。然而，它也带来了挑战，例如计算负担增加以及对几何和辐射质量的更高要求。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the perceived challenges in classifying land cover using remotely sensed imagery, particularly in distinguishing between cropland and grassland?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 使用遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时，特别是在区分农田和草地方面，面临的挑战是什么？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The primary challenge in classifying land cover using remotely sensed imagery lies in the high uncertainty between categories like cropland and grassland, especially in dryland systems. This is due to variations in the minimum threshold required for forest cover and differences in the data quality and properties. Addressing these uncertainties requires better classification methods and the integration of multiple data sources.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 使用遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类的主要挑战在于类别之间的高不确定性，例如农田和草地，特别是在干旱地区。这是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值的变化以及数据质量和属性的差异。解决这些不确定性需要更好的分类方法和多种数据源的整合。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In your view, how crucial is the role of Google Earth's very high spatial resolution data in enhancing the accuracy and cost-effectiveness of land cover mapping?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在您看来，Google Earth的超高空间分辨率数据在提高土地覆盖制图的准确性和成本效益方面有多重要？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Google Earth's very high spatial resolution data plays a crucial role in enhancing the accuracy of land cover mapping by providing precise validation data. It improves sampling accuracy and significantly reduces the cost of data purchasing and field campaigns. This capability allows for more accurate and cost-effective land cover mapping, especially when used alongside other remote sensing datasets.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 谷歌地球的高空间分辨率数据在提高土地覆盖制图的准确性方面发挥了关键作用，因为它提供了精确的验证数据。它提高了采样准确性，并显著降低了数据购买和实地考察的成本。这种能力使得土地覆盖制图更加准确和经济，尤其是在与其他遥感数据集结合使用时。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges faced when using time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定在使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图时面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: One of the main challenges is that using time series HJ-1/CCD data significantly increases computational load. Additionally, the geometric and radiometric qualities of the data are not optimal, which complicates its usability for accurate land cover mapping. Despite these challenges, the spatiotemporal advantages of HJ-1/CCD data can enhance mapping accuracy when compared to single remote sensing datasets.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 其中一个主要挑战是，使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据显著增加了计算负担。此外，数据的几何和辐射质量并不理想，这使得其在准确的土地覆盖制图中变得复杂。尽管面临这些挑战，HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势在与单一遥感数据集相比时，可以提高制图的准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why there is a high uncertainty in classifying cropland and grassland from optical remotely sensed imagery.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么从光学遥感影像中对农田和草地的分类存在很高的不确定性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The uncertainty in classifying cropland and grassland arises due to the variability in data quality and a lack of standard classification approaches. Moreover, differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover contribute to this uncertainty, particularly in dryland systems where shrub, grassland, and forest categories overlap.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 在对农田和草地进行分类时，不确定性源于数据质量的变化和缺乏标准分类方法。此外，森林覆盖的最低阈值差异也加剧了这种不确定性，特别是在干旱地区，灌木、草地和森林类别之间存在重叠。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please identify potential remote sensing datasets that could be integrated to improve eco-hydrological process modeling and discuss their respective contributions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请识别潜在的遥感数据集，这些数据集可以集成以改善生态水文过程建模，并讨论它们各自的贡献。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Potential datasets include HJ-1/CCD data, Landsat TM/ETM+ data, MODIS data, and very high spatial resolution data from sources like Google Earth. Each dataset provides different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands, which can collectively enhance modeling by offering more detailed and varied land-cover information. These datasets can help address issues of classification uncertainty and improve overall modeling accuracy.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 潜在的数据集包括HJ-1/CCD数据、Landsat TM/ETM+数据、MODIS数据以及来自Google Earth等来源的高空间分辨率数据。每个数据集提供不同的时空分辨率和光谱波段，这些数据集可以通过提供更详细和多样的土地覆盖信息来增强建模。这些数据集可以帮助解决分类不确定性问题，提高整体建模准确性。
